meanings.definition: Reluctance to work or make an effort
meanings.sent1: Her sloth in completing assignments often led to late submissions.
meanings.sent2: The sloth of the student was evident in his lack of participation.
meanings.sent3: Despite her sloth, she managed to finish the project just in time.
meanings.sent4: His sloth resembled a stubborn rock, unmoved by any motivation.
meanings.sent5: The sloth of the turtle racing against the hare was comical.

meanings.sent1: The sloth hung lazily from the tree branches, moving at a snail's pace.
meanings.sent2: Visitors to the zoo were delighted to see the adorable sloth sleeping peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The sloth's sleepy eyes opened slowly as it yawned in the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent4: The sloth's gentle movements were like a ballet dancer in slow motion.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled at the sloth's leisurely climb up the tree trunk.

meanings.sent1: His sloth at work often resulted in incomplete tasks and missed deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was hindered by the sloth of its employees.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sloth, he always found time for his favorite hobbies.
meanings.sent4: The sloth of the clouds drifting lazily across the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The sloth of the river's flow mirrored his own lack of motivation.
